SELECT t.REGION_NAME as country, t.REGION_ID as country_id, t.`Level` as country_level, t.state as country_state, bbbb.province as province, bbbb.province_id as province_id, bbbb.province_level as province_level, bbbb.province_state as province_state, bbbb.city as city, bbbb.city_id as city_id, bbbb.city_level as city_level, bbbb.city_state as city_state, bbbb.county as county, bbbb.county_id as county_id, bbbb.county_level as county_level, bbbb.county_state as county_state
FROM region t, ( SELECT b1.PARENT_ID as parent3, b1.REGION_NAME as province, bbb.reg_name2 as city, bbb.reg_name3 as county, bbb.city_id as city_id, bbb.county_id as county_id, b1.REGION_ID as province_id, bbb.county_level as county_level, bbb.city_level as city_level, b1.`Level` as province_level, bbb.county_state as county_state, bbb.city_state as city_state, b1.state as province_state FROM region b1, ( SELECT a.PARENT_ID as parent2, a.`Level` as lev, a.REGION_NAME as reg_name2, bb.reg_name as reg_name3, a.region_id as city_id, bb.county_id as county_id, bb.county_level as county_level, a.`Level` as city_level, bb.county_state as county_state, a.state as city_state FROM region a, ( SELECT b.PARENT_ID AS parent1, b. LEVEL AS lev, b.REGION_NAME AS reg_name, b.region_id as county_id, b.`Level` as county_level, b.state as county_state FROM region b WHERE b. LEVEL = 3 ) bb WHERE a.REGION_ID = bb.parent1 )bbb WHERE b1.REGION_ID = bbb.parent2 )bbbb WHERE t.REGION_ID = bbbb.parent3

SELECT t.REGION_NAME as province, t.REGION_ID as province_id, bb.city_name as city, bb.city_id as city_id FROM region t, ( SELECT b.province_name as province_name, t.REGION_NAME as city_name, t.REGION_ID as city_id, t.PARENT_ID as parent_id FROM region t, (SELECT a.Province as province_name,a.City as city_name FROM base_bankcard a WHERE a.UserID = #{userId}) b WHERE t.REGION_NAME = b.city_name )bb WHERE t.REGION_ID = bb.parent_id;
